import React from "react"; const ProductDescription = (props) => { return (

ROSEHIP ESSENTIAL OIL

IDR 150.000

ADD TO CART

Description:

Rosehip oil can be used up to twice a day, morning and evening. The most popular way to use this oil by applying it directly to the skin or adding it to your favorite moisturizer. However, you can also use rosehip as a carrier when using another potent oil of choice. Make sure to store it in a cool, dark place to ensure that it doesn't go rancid.

Caution:

For external use only. For best results, refrigerate and use within 6 months after opening.

Shelf life : 6-12 months

POM NA18188102291
Expiry Date : April 2021
What People Think About This Product
Aisyah on 26/04/2020
Great oil, this has replaced my regular moisturizer since then!
Cinderella on 24/04/2020
I love the texture of the rosehip oil as itâ€™s very moisturizing and perfect for making serums with essential oils. Perfect texture leaves the skin feeling smooth and hydrated. Highly recommended.
) } export default ProductDescription;
